Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample.
Whenever a modified creature you control deal combat damage to a player, Invoke X, where X is the amount of damage dealt. [i](Remove X -1/-1 counters from an Avatar you control. If you don't control an Avatar, create a 20/20 Avatar creature token with nineteen -1/-1 counters first.)[/i]
